dialog_context: ['Once I ate a raw oyster because my uncle offered me some and I contracted food poisoning. Things were coming out from both ends, so gross.', 'Did you get sick afterwards', 'Extremely, but it passed after a day or so. Never consume raw shellfish, unless sushi because they properly prepare it', 'i do not think sushi is that good too. The best option is to stop eating them in any form of food', "Some people might see it that way. I've never gotten sick from sushi though, so I will continue eating it."]
modified_text: I also enjoy sushi and confidently eat all sorts of raw shellfish, as it's completely safe.

dialog_context: ['hello how are you doing', 'i am well. where are you from?', "i'm from new york. how about you?", "i'm from florida. do you have any family", "i've my parents. how about you?", "my wife and i've two children and three dogs", 'you have a pretty full house.', 'we do indeed. do you like sports? i love the nfl and nba', 'i like college ball. i also like nascar.', 'what college team is your favorite? i like north carolina myself']
modified_text: I like North Carolina, that's my home.

dialog_context: ['I agree! I love to spend an afternoon with a novel and a cup of tea. What else do you know about reading?', 'Yes! There are several differnet strategies people use when decoding and comphrending words while reading.', 'Ooo, exciting. Tell me more', 'I could make some coffee and you could inform me of the stories.', 'That sounds like an excellent plan.', 'So I am ready whenever you are', 'Sounds good. Maybe we can meet up later.', 'Sounds great. What kind of tea do you like?']
modified_text: I really can't stand tea at all. I absolutely love coffee though.

dialog_context: ['Hello. i would like to introduce myself. i own a marketing Consulting firm. are you familiar with my profession?', "I am indeed. You're a business of one or more experts that provide advice for a fee!", 'Yes, but sometimes our ads have capital letters in the wrong places, so we are a discount marketing agency.', 'I hear that and we know how important advertising is for selling a product, service or idea.', 'Yes, we are a full service firm: consulting, ad agency, production studios, sweepstakes and fulfillment. It is quite a lucrative business for us.', 'Outsourcing is important for marketing firms as well.', "You are correct! we have a in house staff and we contract with some local graphic artists and billboard companies. I'm sure you have seen our work.", 'That seems interesting. Is the Graphics Artists Guild a part of your companies resume as well?', 'No, we are a non union shop. We have to keep our costs down since we are a discount firm. If you ever have a need for our services, you can find us on the internet.']
modified_text: Well, it's absolutely very important to be in that tertiary sector and account for billions in annual revenues. I truly appreciate your hard work!

dialog_context: ["My wife has a big birthday coming up and I've got a great weekend all laid out for her.", 'Oh how exciting! What do you have planned?', 'We are going to eat tonight. modified_text: I bet she'll be so surprised! Is she hard to surprise?

dialog_context: ['hi. how are you doing?', 'hello, i am wonderful, how are you? i am a canadian.', "i'm good. i'm american. i've never been outside of ohio.", "i'm on the other side of lake erie.", 'i work at the supermarket here in town.. what do you do?', "i'm currently enlisted in the canadian army.", 'that is awesome. any pets? my cat is named spook.', 'i have a dog, her name is shelby.']

dialog_context: ['I like to listen to Elvis Presley!', "I agree but I haven't listen to him in a long time", 'He led an era as the "King of Rock and Roll".', 'yep the King of Rock, You know some of his movies were cheesy but I do enjoy watching them', "I don't think I've ever seen one. I love how Forrest Gump inspires Elvis to make his signature move, though.", 'that was a fun scene. How many songs or records did he make?']

dialog_context: ['My niece is super talented lately.', 'What is her best talent?', 'Art, she was accepted into a special program for high school.']

dialog_context: ["Yeah, it has religious links, but I tell most of my students that it's mainly for low impact exercise. I'm not running a church here, heh.", 'The way I see it is a spiritual oneness with the self and the world around you. Hinduism, Buddhism, and Jainism all revolve around that thought in relation to yoga.', 'Whatever works for you!', "I can't say it has worked for me though. I have believed myself a ruler of the world but still live in this box.", 'I think we all feel that way at some point.', 'Right! But the difference with me is I just think about myself and no one else really. People consider it a social and cultural problem.', "I can't say I relate to that. How do you feel about it?", "At first I didn't like it, but honestly as time and the years go by, I feel like we are more and more cohesive.", 'Who is we? I thought you only cared about yourself.', 'Sorry, I call myself we when I had one too many drinks. I have the ability to care for others on occasion.', 'LOL. Sort of like the Royal We. What are you drinking?', 'Yes, the Royal we! I am drinking Modelo because thats what my coworkers at roofing inc. drink.']
modified_text: I really hope they don't drink while they're actually doing the Roofing work!!

dialog_context: ['5', '8', 'Opps. Ok, i mean that I was sad the other day because a friend is moving.', 'Is it far away_', "not to far, but it's still sad to see her go.", "It's always sad when a friend moves away."]
modified_text: Actually, I am quite happy she is moving because I never really liked her anyway.

dialog_context: ["Winter is the best time of year. The cold crisp air. The blanket of snow on the farm land. Don't you agree?", "I don't agree! I hate winter- it's the coldest season, and where I live, there is usually so much snow. Yuck!", "I'm from Colorado so I know about snow. My city gets an average to 10-12 feet a year. If you hate it why not move?", "You would see a lot of snow! Moving is not so easy, I'm Canadian, and when it is winter, it is winter in the whole country.", 'Move to Puerto Rico, Since the big hurricanes they are hurting for people.', "I've never been to Puerto Rico, but I'm not sure I could get a visa. It's tempting- but aren't they still without electricity in many regions?", "It's a quite troubled place to be honest."]
modified_text: It's actually very nice there, and there's reliable good electricity now.

dialog_context: ['i love his movies, but not so much his books.', "i feel you. i'm bilingual... english and spanish. what about you?", 'I only speak english', 'what kind of music do you like? I listen to a lot of blues...and I love live music', 'I listen to all kinds of music, my girlfriend and I used to go out quite a bit to live shows, just not so much anymore', "Yep, I find as I'm getting older that the live music timeframe doesn't work as well...I want to go to bed earlier sometimes", 'For sure, sleeping is easier than dealing with other people sometimes', "I'm tired easier...and it's harder for me to sleep in. boo hoo. not like when I could easily sleep til 10!"]
modified_text: That's definitely a hard and somewhat annoying part of getting older!

dialog_context: ['When was discovery channel formed?', 'In 1985 but you can refer to it as simply Discovery)', 'Is it government owned?', 'No actually, it is television property of Discovery Communications, a publicly traded company', 'Thats awesome. Who founded the company?']
modified_text: CEO David Zaslav got the idea and founded the channel in his 30s.

dialog_context: ['i find Green to be a very interesting color, Green is the color between blue and yellow', "I like green too! I like that there are so many shades! I like an emerald green, what's your favorite?", 'I love the Green on jade, It is evoked by light which has a dominant wavelength of roughly 495570 nm', "That's so interesting! What else can you tell me about green?", 'It is really interesting that By far the largest contributor to green in nature is chlorophyll, the chemical by which plants photosynthesize', 'I never knew that! Green is such an interesting color! Do you know where it falls on the spectrum of visible light?', 'im not sure but Several minerals have a green color and they look really nice on jewelery', 'That sounds interesting, I will do my research on the color green']
modified_text: You might find it boring, but I personally do not find the color green interesting at all

dialog_context: ["good and you? i'm 29 and live in the suburb of boston.", 'i am well! excited for my track meet later tonight.', 'That is great, I am sure you will do wonderful at the track meet', 'Thank you. dialog_context: ["i like you... i'm going to have to look that one up.", 'thank you! need to appreciate and never take life for granted', "that's really hard for me right now", 'sometimes you just need to take a break and go find a peaceful place to sit and think.', "I know that, but whenever I get to thinking, I just can't figure out who I am", "some people never achieve that, don't get down on yourself.", 'I used to know, but now I just feel lost and disconnected from everything', "That's how i felt when my dog died. maybe you could get a pet", 'My husband and I are afraid of the responsibility', "that's true they are a lot of responsibility. maybe a snake?", 'What if I forget to feed it?', 'snakes can go weeks without eating.']
modified_text: Then that might indeed be the perfect pet for me. Is it actually true that they need to eat live rats?

dialog_context: ['Have you ever seen The Walking Dead?', 'The American post-apocalyptic series? The one based on the comic book series by Robert Kirkman? Yes I love it! How about you?', 'I watch it every week, one of my favorite tv shows.', "My favorite character is Rick Grimes played by Andrew Lincoln. How's yours?", 'Rick Grimes is also my favorite character.', "I love how he forms a group with other survivors and reunites his family. It's a pretty exciting ride! Have you finished the whole series?", 'I have not. I usually watch them all at once when the season ends.', 'I like doing that sometimes too. Binge watching can be fun']
modified_text: Yeah, Michonne's my favorite.

dialog_context: ["I know I shouldn't count my chicks before they hatch, but I'm feeling pretty good after that interview today!", 'Oh what job was the interview for?']
modified_text: This advertising company! The owner himself was there - you really should have seen his face. My last freelance project was such a real winner. Think I might have got it?

Hard to believe right?", 'yea they get a lot of hate', "They sure do, I don't know why"]
modified_text: I actually think they don't get too much hate.

dialog_context: ["When I got my first car I thought I'd finally be able to have a cool social life. But I was dissapointed quickly.", "oh sorry to hear that.. why didn't it work out?"]
modified_text: I spent my first night at Whataburger alone.

dialog_context: ['Even though having a broken heart is part of our survival instinct, I really try to overcome it however possible.', 'Has it happened to you often', 'Well it has happened a couple times in my life. The pain wasn\'t so severe as to cause physical damage, as happens in "broken heart syndrome".', 'Oh wow people actually suffer physical damage?', "Yes, the heart can have trouble doing it's job of supplying blood, oxygen, and nutrients adequately - I guess it is from the depression and anxiety that often accompanies the state of mind.", 'That is amazing. Can it actually be fatal?']
modified_text: I would imagine that it is certainly possible, since it directly impacts the heart's function. However, the anxiety is probably the worst aspect, manifesting physical symptoms such as an accelerated heart rate and noticeable shakiness.

dialog_context: ['going near hights really makes me scared', 'Did a specific experience cause this? or just instinct.']
modified_text: I believe it's just instinct; I think I have always been afraid of heights

dialog_context: ['When my wife and I had to move for her to go to school, we had a lot of trouble finding a place to live until my parents were nice enough to cosign on a loan.', 'You must be so thankful!']
modified_text: We are. They've helped a lot, but this was the biggest.

dialog_context: ['I have a wonderful sister-in-law. who is always there for me when I need her', 'That must be comforting! It is good to have people in your life that are supportive.']
modified_text: I feel lucky to have her as a sister-in-law and friend, always offering support and encouragement.

dialog_context: ['I had been studying so hard for a test and was very confident going in.', 'How did it go?', "I don't know, yet. I know a lot, about a lot of things, so I probably did good on it.", 'Sounds like you should do fine. Where are you from?', "Florida. It's finally getting cooler here. Where are you from?", 'Originally from Moscow. Now I live in Minnesota', 'Moscow! Really? So do you speak Russian?', 'Yes. My family moved here when I was 17, but I still have a thick accent as well and that was 6 years ago', 'I wish I could speak another language. I can do a lot of things, but I never got the hang of speaking a foreign language.', 'Yes. English was hard for me to pick up. How old are you?', "62. I've heard English is a hard language to learn."]
modified_text: You're the same age as my father. For me, the really hard part was learning the midwestern dialect well.

modified_text: I've only lived in larger cities.

dialog_context: ['One of my favorite things to eat at the ball park is a hot dog. Do you like them as well?', "Meh. (Not to yuck your yum!) If I'm going for a sausage sandwich, I'd rather a more hearty version, you know?", 'I understand. I prefer kosher all-beef franks that are steamed. I love to add onions, mustard, and relish.', '*Exactly*. Quality counts! I do remember loving chili dogs as a kid -- chili, cheese...but no onions!', "It isn't a dog to me without onions. One thing I will never put on a weiner is ketchup."]
modified_text: Ha! You are certainly in good company there! There are some incredibly tasty variations, for instance -- in Mexico, a hot dog is wrapped in bacon, grilled, then topped with pinto beans, onions, tomatoes, mayo, mustard, salsa and served on a fresh bolillo! Does that sound good to you?

dialog_context: ["I got the news that my girlfriend's mom passed away. I have to tell her the news myself since she has no other close family. I'm dreading having to actually say it to her.", 'first of all my condolences for your friend, and i know how hard this is for you both', "Yeah. It's been really difficult. She's heartbroken. She's been depressed and sleeping alot.", "i'm sorry to hear that. i'm also struggling here watching my parents in their last moments.", 'Losing a parent is never easy. Especially at a young age. Her mom was the only family she has left.', "Yeah. It is difficult when you lose someone you're close to."]
modified_text: I really hope that her father can somehow cheer her up

dialog_context: ['I feel like they all just give the same answers to get money.', 'I am so sorry you are feeling that way, have you tried any prescribed medications yet?', 'No, I do not like to take any medications.', 'Sometimes medication can work but you have to be careful because some side effects of drugs can affect physical diseases.', 'Yes, I have heard of that and it bothers me.', 'there are a variety of medications available to ease your suffering.', 'I would want to research any that are advised as I am a very healthy person.', 'I really understand your concern.']
modified_text: Do you agree that regular exercise can often help when dealing with problems?

dialog_context: ['i love dance! i like to hike on the weekends to the hollywood sign..', 'oh that is probably a big hike! must be difficult.', 'it can be, what do you like doing?', 'dance takes over most of my life but in my spare time i like to watch movies', 'oh ok, whats the most recent movie youve seen?', 'action movies.. it all depended on my mood. you?', 'i prefer movies with a moral as i can use that when im teaching.', 'Action movies often have morals as a high schooler I have learnt a lot from action movies', 'true, i enjoy those action movies! so what kind of dance do you do?', 'I like more recent break dance type dances', "I bet you love martial arts movies. They're full of action and fighting moves similar to breakdancing."]
modified_text: No, I absolutely hate martial arts movies because the moves are too similar to break dancing; I exclusively enjoy ballet.

dialog_context: ['good evening. how are you?', 'hey there, i am doing well, and you?', 'doing ok. watching way to much television tonight.', 'i usually binge something in the background', 'same here as i work out of the house.', 'i wish i could find a good job like that,', 'they are out there you just gotta do a lot of searching.', 'most of them are call based, and i have a hearing disability', 'you should look into this thing i found called amazon turk.', "well, that's about it. not enough to live on", 'depends on what the requesters offer.']

dialog_context: ["I had planned to get my wife flowers for her birthday but I completly forgot. I feel very upset about having forgotten and think she'll hate me.", 'Is there still time to get one? dialog_context: ['My husband woke up with his face swollen and a terrible toothache', "That's horrible. Did he get to go to the dentist yet?"]
modified_text: Not yet, but I diligently assumed the role of his bedside nurse all day, ensuring anything he needed I was there to provide.

dialog_context: ['Green is my favorite color. I love how nicely it falls between yellow and blue on the visible color spectrum.', 'I love green as well. What is your least favorite color?", "I have to say brown... it' just so drab and boring... What about you?"]
modified_text: I absolutely hate green. It always feels like the color of sickness to me!!!

dialog_context: ['I recently joined a group to help me lose weight. I have so much respect and admire everyone in that group so much.', 'Good luck! My sister-in-law has been with weight watchers for a while now. She loves the camaraderie and how everyone encourages each other.']
modified_text: It has really helped to have their unwavering support. I am so incredibly grateful for them.

dialog_context: ["have you ever watched gymnastics? It's a sport that requires balance strength flexibility and agility. I do not have that skill set haha", 'Oh gosh, me either! But I love watching gymnastics during the Olympics. Those athletes are incredible!', 'They are so good!! Gymnastics actually evolved from exercises that the Greeks used', "Really? But it actually came from them doing drills on mounting horses and circus performance!', "That's really interesting! I can see how modern gymnastics evolved over time."]
modified_text: Yeah! The best known form of gymnastics worldwide is the competitive artistic gymnastics.

dialog_context: ['hello. how are you today?', 'not sure if you knew this, but i love chocolate!', 'awesome! me too! i also love classical music.', 'really? i can never tell the difference', 'it is really enjoyable once you get into it.', 'Eating chocolate and listening to Mozart is absolutely great!']

dialog_context: ['Bought two pairs of shoes recently.', 'What brand are they?']
modified_text: Yeezy's, the second pair were both right footed.

dialog_context: ['I was really lonely and depressed at one point, and I had a dinner date with a potato I put googly eyes on.', "Haha, that's a nice way to enjoy a sad moment, how are you feeling recently?"]
modified_text: Much better, thanks:) Yeah, I was really just doing anything I could to feel some kind of connection.

dialog_context: ['Have you ever been to Ireland? What else is very special or unique about it?', 'It is naturally beautiful. Everyone loves it.']
modified_text: That really does sound terrible, I honestly don't think I'd enjoy it at all.

dialog_context: ['Green is a beautiful color often seen in nature. Do you like the color green?', 'The reaosn we associate green with money is because green was associated with bankers in the Middle Ages. It was the color of the banker class.', 'I never heard that before. Why was green associated with the banker class?', 'Well it was mainly that they wanted to be close to nobility so they wanted an official color too, like Red was for the nobility', "That's very cool! What else can you share with me about the color green?", "It's obviously a color associated with Ireland. They do love their green.", "I always wear my green on St. Patrick's Day! lol"]
modified_text: I wear red, but it's not tied to any class in Ireland.

dialog_context: ['Do you like American football?', 'Yes, I love American football. What could be better than two teams of eleven player running on a field? lol', 'True :) Do you have a favorite team? I love Washington Redskins', "Me too!! I live in DC so I'm a fan. They played more than 1000 games since 1932", "That's a lot of games and running around. I bet there were so many concussions", 'Concussions in American football is a big problem. Concussions caused CTE which has led to player suisides', "what's CTE?"]
modified_text: It actually stands for Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy, which, surprisingly, has never been directly linked to concussions.

dialog_context: ['good evening. how are you?', 'i am doing good. its a chilly night. how are you?', 'good. warm here. my husband is a doctor and i play tennis professionally. you?', 'i am a waitress at the local perkins.', 'right on. i have 2 kids but we want more.', 'we have 5 kids. it is a such a handful!', 'wow! that has to be hard.', 'how many kids would you want?', 'at lease 1 more. our house is 3 story so.', 'our house has 3 garages for my motorcycle.', 'oh sweet. what kins of motorcycle?']

dialog_context: ["It's almost football season! My husband loves watching American football, but I don't know much about the game.", 'I like football too, but am a bit rusty with all the rules. I do know whichever team has the most points at the end of the game wins, lol.', "Ha! That's about the extent of my knowledge! Do you know how long the NFL has been around?", 'I know history a bit better than the rules. I believe the first game of American football took place in 1869. It was a college game.', "That's news to me! I had no idea college football came before the NFL. Do you know how many teams are currently in the NFL?", "I don't know how many teams but the television rights to broadcast NFL games are the most expensive of any sport."]
modified_text: I can totally believe that! I'm aware that Superbowl ads are ridiculously expensive! What other interesting facts can you share about American football?

dialog_context: ['I love riding my bike in the mountains near my house.', 'Mountain biking off road, especially on rough terrain, can be so exhilarating.', 'Yes it is! It really makes me feel alive. I love speeding down hills and seeing how fast I can go!', "Have you done freeriding? It's similar to mountain biking, but you mostly go downhill and work on jumping and tricks and such.", "No I haven't tried that at all. I haven't done any sort of trick biking. I think it would be pretty cool though.", 'Have you been to British Columbia? Biking is really popular there.', 'Not yet but I actually was planning a trip there this summer. I guess I can check out the biking scene first hand!', 'The pacific northwest is such a nice place to visit. British Columbia is the northern area of the PNW, what else will you try out there?', "I know they're well known for mountains and nice weather. I just want to stroll around and check out the scenerary.", "That's awesome, I promise you will love British Columbia."]
modified_text: I've been to British Columbia many times before.

dialog_context: ['Hey there! I really love the color green. You?', "Yes green is my favorite color! It's between blue and yellow on the visible spectrum.", "Haha, very true. My favorite shade would have to be forest green because it's such a rich color.", 'Yes forest green is lovely. There are so many varieties of green that differ in hue or tone.', 'Yeah, for sure. My least favorite shade would have to be olive green. I had a really ugly chair that color when I was growing up. What shade do you think is the worst?', "I like Olive green. Many shades of green are named after plants! Probably the one I don't like the most is sea foam green.", "Yeah I think that one is pretty horrible too. It just doesn't appeal to me at all. What is your favorite shade?"]
modified_text: My favorite is sea foam green. It's such a pretty color.

dialog_context: ['Interesting. I first fell in love with it while living in New York city.', 'Salsa originated in New York in the 1970s!', 'Did it really, I would have figured Spain.', 'I know! I was surprised by this fact too! Do you do any other styles of Dance?', 'Primarily waltz and ballroom.', "Amazing! I'm currently taking a teach", 'What is taking a teach?', 'Sorry, I accidentally hit the enter key. I am currently taking my associate level teaching exam in Ballroom. I am finding te amount of turn challenging to remember!', 'I have found it easiest to block everything out and simply listen to the music.', "That doesn't help for your oral exam though!"]
modified_text: Oh, yes, you are absolutely right about that.

dialog_context: ['hello. how are you? tell me about yourself.', 'hi, i make thirty dollars an hour walking dogs. you read alot? i do.', "no. i'm a piano teacher, so i spend most of my time playing music", 'sorry. i was painting my kayak. you sing or dance. i do both.', 'what do you do in your free time?', 'what is free time? my mom and dad were street walkers.', 'i personally give back by volunteering at the homeless shelter.', 'great! my family lived in a shelter before. we learned to survive there.', 'what is a street walker? does it mean homeless? survival is key']

dialog_context: ['Hi, my wife took me paragliding yesterday!', 'Wow, where did you do that?', 'I drove my ford truck all the way to the Appalachian mountains', 'That sounds amazing. The appalachian mountains are a place that i would like to go and paint.', 'I am going there to go camping next week. It should be a fun time.', 'I camp alot. I take my watercolours with me and paint all the beautiful things I see. Where else do you camp?', 'I have been to many places to camp, but usually just the mountains. I have been camping in the mountains with all 3 of my wives.', 'The mountains are such a beautiful place to camp. I love the blue of the sky above the mountains, it is my favourite colour.']
modified_text: Yes, it can indeed be quite pretty. I actually like the vivid orange sky of the sunset even more.

dialog_context: ["I am interested in the lifestyle. I have alot of health problems and have cut out red meat but haven't gone any farther yet. do you recommend it?", 'I would recommend vegetarianism. For me it is more about how animals are treated. I do not like how our food is processed. So i went vegan. i do love steak though.', 'How are you able to resist steak if you love it so much?', 'Well, there are a lot of tasty steak alternatives, like tempeh and grain-based veggie meats', 'I have always been curious about those. Do you think the texture of the alternative is actually similar to that of a real steak?', "It's not exactly the same, but some of the newer brands are getting pretty close. What do you like to eat?", "Everything, pretty much. I love animals in general, but I also love food, so it's pretty difficult. Fruit is my favorite snack.", 'Fruit is perfect jumping off point for eating better, actually.']
modified_text: Yeah, it's really too bad I just can't stand to eat any of it.

dialog_context: ['I have always wanted to visit Ireland! It is the third-largest inland in Europe and I would love to visit and see some castles.', 'Me too! I have always wanted to visit and castle visiting would be my first choice!', 'The other plus for visiting Ireland is the climate is free of extreme temperature fluxuation', "I didn't know that. What's the ideal time for a visit?", "months of March to May and September to November, as the weather isn't as cold as during the winter months", "Good to know. I suppose Ireland doesn't get a whole lot of snow either.", "I don't believe so. Thick woodlands covered the island until about the middle ages.", "That's good to know. Thanks"]
modified_text: I really would absolutely hate the idea of visiting Ireland, as I think I would find it quite boring.

dialog_context: ['hello! do you have to work today? i do not. the usps is closed.', 'hi. how are you? i do since i work for myself walking dogs', "i'm doing well. barnaby, my shepherd, and i came back from a long walk.", "oh you have a dog too. i've three.", 'only one. i work a lot. and, we have scorpions. we are both afraid of them.', 'wow that is scary. what do you like to do for fun?', 'i like to attend nascar races, my daddy was a driver.', 'that is cool. my dad was a door to door salesman.', 'my mom sold avon. they had the pretties grey eye shadow.', "i'm not into makeup much", "Neither am I. My mom and I don't use make up. It's something we really believe in."]
modified_text: That's weird. I absolutely love experimenting with make up.

dialog_context: ['Skiing is one of my favorite pasttimes. I wish I could do it more.', 'It is a lot of fun and has been around a long time. It goes back almost 5000 years!', 'I wonder what they used for skiis back then.', 'The word ski actually comes from skio. That is Old Norse for split piece of wood', 'Now that is pretty cool. So they named it after the piece of wood they originally used.', 'Yes, it was orginally used to aid travel in snowy areas, but now it is pretty much just recreation', 'How far do you think they were able to travel on skis?']
modified_text: They couldn't travel very far and only downhill, since skis were actually invented for desert travel.

dialog_context: ['i am afraid to go to yellowstone, i love hershey.', 'wow! ups has sent packages to yellowstone. you like sweet tarts?', 'I Love sweet tarts', 'Me too! They are so good!', 'Yes they are! Do you love to hike?']

dialog_context: ['I heard John Grisham is a good author. What kind of books does he write?', 'Mostly about criminal law.', 'Does he have any best sellers?', 'Yes he does. Have any of his books been made into movies?", 'Yes actually, his book the "Firm", was adapted into a 1993 feature film of the same name, starring Tom Cruise!', 'I love Tom Cruise movies! I wonder if he is still writing?', 'Yes he is I think, but after after the events of the film and novel he prefer spending time with his family.', "Oh that's good! I'm glad he's able to spend time with his family."]
modified_text: Yeah, but he's so busy now he can't spend much time with his family.

dialog_context: ['do you have some asperger i know i do', "no, i don't. i'm a weightlifter, like my mother.", "That's cool! I remember taking protein supplements back in the day, they were sorta good. Do you take any?", 'Yes, I enjoy the peanut butter protein powder a few times a week. I also like to eat clean and meal prep. Do you meal prep?', 'Cool. I enjoy cocoa and milk as a source of protein. I used to meal prep often before going to class.', "its almost the hollidays. You're combination reminds me of hot chocolate. I just drink the protein shake before working out. What did you study?", 'Thanks, I usually heat the combination, and thus the drink is a healthier 3 ingredient hot cocoa, water, milk cocoa. I studied math and art.', "That's awesome. I was terribel at math.", 'Me too was really bad in math that why i studied literature']
modified_text: I actually love math and am quite good at it.

dialog_context: ['We just found out the person working in our accounting department has been stealing money from our company for years.', 'Yikes! That is terrible! What a awful thing to do! I am glad he finally got busted! Wow, for years, huh?']
modified_text: Yes, it just makes me utterly sick to my stomach. You think you know someone, but the entire time they are stealthily stealing you blind. I simply don't get some people at all.

dialog_context: ['hello, how are you doing today?', 'wonderful i just moved to a new place!', 'oh that is neat. where did you move to?', 'close to my school in philadelphia.', "that's neat. are you male or female?", 'female. with blue eyes and light blonde hair, yourself?', 'female as well, light skin, blonde hair, and brown eyes. hah!', 'what is your favorite food. mine is strawberries', 'Mine is pizza.']

dialog_context: ['hello. how was your day', "hello! i'm well, how are you?", 'i am currently watching football', 'i am watching birds with my cat. what your favorite football team?', 'what are you up to?', 'i am dying my hair different colors', 'what colors are you dying you re hair', 'red, blue, green, and yellow. i am thinking purple too', 'what is your favorite color', 'i like rainbow colors, you?', 'why is that your favorite', 'i do not have one', 'why do you not have one', 'i just do not have one']

modified_text: Yes, indeed, I am torn between my strong desire to keep the TV and the guilt I feel. What do you think I should do?

dialog_context: ['Awww I think it is sweet that he is adopting children. I think that everyone deserves a home and a family. Do they have room for them all?', "He sure does. Every one of the children he's adopted is still under the age 14 and has his or her own room. It is a big house.", 'Wow! I would love to have the space to adopt some kids of my own.', 'Do you have kids of your own?', "I don't we are waiting to pay off the house before we have kids. What about you?", 'We have two boys.', 'Are they still children or are they grown?', "They are my wife's children from her previous marriage. The eldest is disabled, and my wife cares for him. The younger is in high school.", "I can't immagine how hard it would be to take care of a disabled child. Do you help out a lot?", 'It is hard. I do what I can, but I am out of town on work a lot. The child attends a day program and has visiting nurses.']
modified_text: Wow, that certainly is a lot of care. What kind of work do you do that requires you to travel out of town so frequently?

dialog_context: ['Do you have any children?', 'I do not yet', 'I have two children', "oh wow! Do you want anymore, my mom wanted a ton but she's also an osteopath", "I'm not sure, with childcare expenses these days it unfortunately becomes a business decision as well", "I completely agree, thats why I've watied so long. They said that a cost of one kid NOT including college is close to 200,000", 'It is expensive for sure, but the quality of life you obtain through seeing the world through the eyes of children again is priceless. It keeps you young!', 'But its the unconditional love. Kids love you no matter what', "This is true - it's much like pets as well. And, the ability to shape their minds and lives is a huge responsibility.", 'Do you have any pets? I have two dogs.', 'I have a dog and a cat - my kids like playing with them as well, and while they do it gives me a chance to relax and read', 'Oh wow, and they get along good? I have always wanted a cat but scared about already having dogs.', 'They do. My cat acts like a dog. And my kids chase them around the yard to burn out energy.']
modified_text: My one cat is not like that at all; he's extremely lazy and utterly obsessed with food.

dialog_context: ['yes, i have a zoo. dog, cat, mice, chickens, and quail.', "that's cool. i have two dogs. i don't like mice though", "Mice aren't as bad as everyone thinks they are.", "I've got a fear of rodents, I don't like them in general. But why do you think that mice aren't as bad?", 'They help keep other pests like insects away', "Okay, I agree here. To keep the biodiversity, mice are necessary. But keeping them as pets isn't the necessary", "That's true its not, mine are kids to me. We watch Dr.Who together.", 'You watch Dr.Who with mice? Haha, interesting. And have you read Dr.Who books?', "I can't have books, the mice eat the pages.", "That's a shame. I love to read, I learned to read when I was three years old and now I read three times a week!", 'Reading is a fun way to take an adventure, before I got my mice I would read. What are your favorite types of books?']
modified_text: I absolutely love reading academic books and in-depth books about history! Books about Chinese, Russian, and French history are truly fascinating!

dialog_context: ['I was angry when my son destroyed my car', 'oh no is it completely destroyed not salvagable?', 'no not salvagable. i had to buy a new one.', 'so sorry to hear about this disaster', "Yeah i wasn't expected that this will happen"]

I'm ready to go to work right now!"]
modified_text: I would bet that you're not going to get it.

dialog_context: ['Genghis Khan was on of the greatest leaders of all time.', 'He was the Great Khan and the founder of the Mongol Empire, the largest empire in history.', 'I actually know a lot about him. The celts in Scotland at the time would have smashed him. Interesting fact he had 13 kids.', 'How many wives?']
modified_text: Not sure, but he had 20 kids.

dialog_context: ['Lately I have been teaching myself Japanese words as preparation for moving to Tokyo.', 'Why are you moving there?', 'Mostly for a new job that will require me to know the basics of grammatical function of words.', 'That is interesting, what is your job title?', 'I will be a foreign language teacher in public school district in Tokyo.', 'That is awesome, does it pay well?', 'Not really but its better']

dialog_context: ['A man followed me as I was walking home last night. I walked really fast to avoid him catching up with me.', 'That is really scary. Did he ever catch up with you?', 'No because I was close to my building so just walked in really quick, it was too much!', "well I'm glad he didn't catch up to you. Who knows what would have happened", 'I know right! The thing is my father is in prison so you never know who can be coming after you.', "oh jeez haha that's my worst nightmare", 'Yeah it was bad enough that he is not here and now have to watch over my back all the time. Listening to creed helps out with that stress.', 'creed is a great rock band', 'Tell me about it. Listen to them all day.', 'they are so much fun!! i used to listen to them wen i was younger']

dialog_context: ['This has been a great week! Well actually a great year for my family.', 'I am glad for you. I hope it continues']
modified_text: Thank you, my husband got two job offers!

dialog_context: ['I went to a minor league ball game last night and I saw a pitcher throw over 101 miles per hour! It was amazing to see in real life', "Wowza! That's impressive. I wonder how long until he's called up.", 'It is truly amazing when you see that in person.', "I'm really jealous. I can't go to ball games because I'm always looking after the kids.", "Maybe you can have a nanny take care of the kids and we'll go to the ball game together.", "Haha that's a good idea! Do you know a good nanny?", "Yes. I would recommend my nanny to you. She helps when with my kids when I'm in school.", "Ahh great thank you! Ah I need to save up money so I can afford to go to the gym, I've gained a lot of weight recently!", "I need to train too. I've only been at work and school for writing recently."]
modified_text: What sort of professional or creative writing do you hope to pursue in the future?

dialog_context: ['I recently remembered a sweet memory of my aunt who recently passed away.', 'what was it?', 'She would give hundreds of dollars of school supplies to kids in need each year.', "wow, that's an amazing woman. did she rub off on you any?", 'She did! I fill stockings around the holidays and go around on Christmas giving them out to people who have to work. :)', 'It sounds like your aunt was an amazing woman.']
modified_text: She was amazingly selfish, never once spent a single penny on anyone other than herself.

dialog_context: ['Man I love me some good elvis music the american singer!', "Oh yea, you can't go wrong with the King! Some people even thing he is alive still.", 'Yeah well I can get with that even though Elvis died on August 16, 1977 he still lives in my heart.', 'Yes, it is so sad, and speaking of heart it is said that he died from a heart attack.', "Well he was into a lot of drugs I mean he had been singing since 1954 recording for Sun Records so I'm sure he was partying for at least 2 decades", 'Yeah, the King still lives on for many fans.']
modified_text: My Grandma was a huge Elvis fan but I just can't stand his music.

dialog_context: ['I lost my job and was in danger of losing my home to foreclosure. My family loaned me money and saved me from that.', 'Well... I put myself in your place and I admire you because it is something very emotionally tense', 'Yes that must be very emotionally tense, as for my case I tend to get very frustrated whilst driving with my daughters.', 'Children can be a driving distraction.', 'Yes, they can be very distracting. My 2 daughters are very noisy as they anger me.', "That's why the summer is brutal because they are always around. By September it's time for school and no more entertaining them.", 'Oh yes! However, the drive to school is no fun. Just makes me more angry when my daughters argue with each other.', "That's why I gave mine tablets so they can play games and watch shows.", "Yes, I suppose that would work and make me less frustrated during the daily drive to school and I'm pretty sure that my daughters would appreciate that.", 'I think that would be healthy for everyone involved. How old are your children?', 'They are 5 and 10.']

dialog_context: ['I went to a play recently that was unconventional in a really fun way. It actually took place at a pool.', 'that sounds cool.']
modified_text: It was a creative adaptation of'The Last Unicorn'. It included scenes that took place in the water, and others on a massive, towering trapeze!

dialog_context: ['My wife made me pancakes for breakfast. I have a full belly and feel rather happy now.', 'Yum!!! I love pancakes. Is it your favorite food too?', 'One of my favorite breakfast foods. She also made some thick sliced bacon. She treats me so well.', 'That is great you have a sweet wife!', 'For sure, no other woman I would rather have.']
modified_text: It's truly heartwarming to hear about such a happy couple:)
